com.programmerdan.minecraft.civspy

Class DataBatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.programmerdan.minecraft.civspy.DataBatcher

  • public class DataBatcher
extends Object
    Roughly similar approach to Manager; stage() unwinds data to batch it up, then other task(s) come along to deliver to the database.
    Author:
    ProgrammerDan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataBatcher(Database db, Logger logger, Long maxBatchSize, Long maxBatchWait, Integer maxBatchers)
      Creates a new Data Batcher.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shutdown()
      Force an orderly shutdown of the batching process.
      void stage(DataSampleKey key, DataAggregate aggregate)
      DataManager calls this to queue aggregates up for batch commit.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataBatcher

        public DataBatcher(Database db,
                   Logger logger,
                   Long maxBatchSize,
                   Long maxBatchWait,
                   Integer maxBatchers)
        Creates a new Data Batcher.
        Parameters:
        db - The Database to send data to. Wraps a connection pool.
        logger - The Logger instance to use for logging.
        maxBatchSize - The maximum number of elements to commit together as a batch
        maxBatchWait - The maximum amount of time to wait for that max elements to show up
        maxBatchers - The maximum number of workers constructing batches simultaneously

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Force an orderly shutdown of the batching process. Waits until the queue is done or 2 minutes have elapsed. Once dequeue has occurred, waits up to 2 minutes for the consequential commits to complete.

      • stage

        public void stage(DataSampleKey key,
                  DataAggregate aggregate)
        DataManager calls this to queue aggregates up for batch commit.
        Parameters:
        key - The DataSampleKey to index this aggregate against.
        aggregate - A DataAggregate which holds either one or more aggregations of data over a time period.
